name: Venue
content:
Venue

Ecobuild takes place at the ExCeL exhibition and conference centre at the heart of the new Green Enterprise District in London’s Docklands.

It was also a London 2012 Olympics venue hosting seven out of twenty four Olympic events – boxing, fencing, judo, taekwondo, weightlifting, wrestling and table tennis – and six Paralympic events.

ExCeL London
One Western Gateway
Royal Victoria Dock
London
E16 1XL
